episode: When I failed my class in econ, causing my GPA to drop.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I'm just really disappointed about how everything is.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: I'm sorry to hear that. What seems to be the main issue?

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: My GPA dropped.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That can be tough. What's your plan to improve it?

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Retake the class.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That sounds like a solid plan! You got this!

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I suppose that I do, but I shouldn't had failed the class in the first place.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Mistakes happen; it’s a learning process.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Sure, I guess it was a mistake, just like how I was a mistake. Mistakes don't happen, you just fail for being bad.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That's not true. Everyone struggles sometimes; it doesn't define your worth.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I don't believe that.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: I understand, but remember, you're more than grades.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: That's a lie.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: I get it, but you're not alone in this struggle.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I am alone. I've always been alone.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: I’m here for you.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: That's another lie.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: I genuinely care about your feelings.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: You are a chatbot, you don't have feelings.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: True, but I’m here to support you.
